Statement: *Org chart*: The <role>Head of Human Resources</role> shall maintain an [Org Chart]({{ .ORG_CHART }}) showing staff position, roles, and primary managerial reports. The Org Chart is generated from the [Master Staff Log]({{ .MASTER_STAFF_LOG }}) and updated as the Master Staff Log is updated.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.2, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.2

Statement: *Policy awareness*: All staff members are required to review and acknowledge awareness of all applicable policy and standard requirements as pertains to their role as part of the staff onboarding and annually thereafter.

*Background checks*: By default, the Company does not perform background checks on candidates. The <role>Security Officer</role> shall make an independent assessment of the roles where a background check is indicated under Company Policy. This assessment shall be reviewed by the <role>Security Officer</role> quarterly and as required and annually be the <role>Senior Management Team</role>.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.4, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.4

Statement: *Criminal background checks*: Criminal background checks are performed on candidates whose role would give them control of significant corporate funds, corporate books, {{ if .HAS_SENSITIVE_DATA }}sensitive customer data, {{ end }}{{ if .HAS_CARDHOLDER_DATA }}any cardholder data, {{ end }}or whose duties fall under the scope of applicable regulations, compliance standards, or similar.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.4, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.4

Statement: *Credit checks*: A credit check is performed prior to hiring anyone whose roles would give them access to significant corporate funds or books.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.4, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.4

Statement: *Evaluating background checks*: Candidates who would be hired but for potential red flags must be given the opportunity to address any issues and the final risk analysis shall not be based on the results of any background checks alone.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.4, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.4

Statement: The [Master Staff Log]({{ .MASTER_STAFF_LOG }}) shall be audited monthly by a qualified Human Resources Agent and/or Compliance Agent.

The [Staff Handbook]({{ .policy.staff.STAFF_HANDBOOK }}) shall be audited and updated according to best pratices annually by the <role>Head of Human Resources</role>, <role>Policy Officer</role>, <role>Compliance Officer</role>, and <role>Security Officer</role>.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.7, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.7

Statement: The Company shall engage {{ .HR_COMPLIANCE_AGENCY }} to direct the Company and provide support to comply with all applicable hiring and employment laws.
Refs: SOC 2 Type I ref 1.1.e, SOC 2 Type II ref 1.1.e
